mapper.select: select m.name,m.password from member m WHERE m.name= #{member.name} and m.password = #{member.password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(name, password, real_name, id_number, sex, phone, email, address) VALUES(#{member.name},#{member.password},#{member.realName},#{member.idNumber},#{member.sex},#{member.phone},#{member.email},#{member.address});
